website_summaries.verdict: A practical pair, these simple slippers are warm and cozy with a snug fit that surround your feet.
pros: Soft, warm, and comfortable enough for extended wear
Memory foam insole molds to feet for a personalized fit
Anti-skid rubber soles allow wearers to venture outdoors
cons: Somewhat androgynous, these aren't the most feminine slippers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: (Tobias’s wife here) I love these! I was a little concerned when I first ordered them, and seeing how so many people stated to go a size up AFTER I ordered them.. But I went with my gut instinct and got the 7/8 (I wear a 7.5) When I received them they did fit a little “small” (back of heel popping out) however after a couple of days of breaking them in, they fit perfect! They are memory foam, so you have to wear them down a little and let them conform to you. I wouldn’t necessarily say to go a “size up” like everybody else is saying. You just gotta break them in! Very comfy though, and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Moore

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are super comfortable and just what I needed for the cold months. I am a 8-8.5 so I ordered the Medium, however it would of been better if I ordered the large (9-10). The Medium fits ok but pretty snug. Order up if you're a halfsize gal like myself. Other than that these slippers are awesome. Due to the rubber soles, you can wear them inside and outside. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ZAWilliamson

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these cozy, cute slippers! I read lots of slipper reviews before choosing these, and I'm glad I picked them. They feel really soft and warm on my feet, they stay on well, and they look nice. You might want to order the next size up if you're between sizes. I'm a 9.5 or 10 and I originally ordered these in a large, but I exchanged for the XL, and the fit is perfect now. The customer service for this was also excellent - super helpful and quick. If you need slippers, I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy - check the recommendations about size before ordering
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are cozy and yummy! I wanted something warm, easy to slip on and with a sole I could wear outside. Glad I read reviews before purchasing so I knew they ran a little small (I wear an 8, but ordered the size designated for 9-10) ... the 7-8 MAY have worked but this size is just fine as is. Very happy with my choice ... and so are my feet!
customer_reviews.author: PBarker77

customer_reviews.title: Buy a bigger size, as they run too small.
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and comfy, but they run too small. I'm a size 11, the 11/12 doesn't fit. I just noticed that others mentioned this.. so if you wear a size 10 for example you probably need the 11/12. Size 11? skip these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about these because I'm not a big slipper person-I prefer socks, but my new apartment floor is just too cold for socks alone. I shouldn't have worried, this are SO warm and very comfortable. I have size 9.5 feet, so these were a little bit small at first because the inner part hadn't been worn in yet-I think it will be fine as I continue to wear them. And I do wear them with socks. Overall I love these and I'm really glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: S. Raju

customer_reviews.title: Heaven on feet
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. These slippers are so incredibly comfortable. I ordered a size up like other reviewers said and they fit perfectly. I typically wear a size 9.5 and I ordered an XL (11/12) and they have a bit of room on the back so my heel isn’t hanging off. I’m in love with these!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Martin

customer_reviews.title: The back ripped apart the first time I put them ...
customer_reviews.text: The back ripped apart the first time I put them on. I was really excited as they are really comfy but definitely not quality. Hoping they would have worked out but no such luck. :(
customer_reviews.author: Smallzman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter. I ordered her usual size shoe and they fit great after wearing them a couple of days. They're very comfortable and keep the feet nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be very well made and are super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be very well made and are super soft and comfortable, however beware of the other size warnings: I’m an 8.5 and size up to the 9-10 size and they “do” fit but my heel comes all the way out to the edge, so I highly doubt that anyone who is actually a size 9-10 would be very comfortable in these.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Do not wear well and still don’t
customer_reviews.text: The slippers were delivered October 16 2018 and I thought the cushion was kind of comfortable. Today November 30 2018 it is like walking barefoot. They do keep your feet warm but not comfortable. I do not know how these slippers get great reviews. I am still looking for slippers. It is now October 30, 2019 and the soles are ripping apart, but they still keep my feet warm with no cushion to the bottom of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and perfect
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are exactly what I was looking for! Nice and cushy, comfortable to wear, and exactly as I had hoped. I am a true size 10 and I purchased a size XL 11/12 and they fit perfect with no extra room so I would size up.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sheets

customer_reviews.title: SO comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these slippers. SO comfortable with the memory foam and warm. Love the thick rubber sole on the bottom, so there is no way you would slip. I bought these to bring the hospital when I give birth, but I am wearing these all the time. My only complaint is that I wear a size 10 shoe. After reading some reviews that these run slightly small (I wear these with and without socks), I opted for the 11-12 size and so glad I did. They fit me perfectly. So, I would definitely size up!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special anout these- memory foam is weak
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to feel like I was walking on clouds when I put these on, but was quickly disappointed. There is nothing special about these memory foam slippers. I would not buy them again nor would I recommend them. I wear a size 8 and these are really short from toe to heel- my heels hang off the back of each.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Slick on carpet
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the shoes are slick on carpet. I fell down the stairs and broke my ankle in week before my wedding. I went to return them and I missed the return date by three days due to my surgery. Do not purchase if you have carpet.
customer_reviews.author: li feng

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, comfy, comfy! (Did I mention comfy?)
customer_reviews.text: Got 'em today and put them on as soon as I got home--wow! Talk about comfort...hope these babies hold their shape and keep my feet warm. I wear a 61⁄2 so I ordered medium--the fit is perfect and will do nicely with some of my thinner socks. I hope they continue to "break in" nicely...I'll give this review an update in a few days. So far, so good! Okay, so I've had these slippers for a while...they've held up through a couple of machine washes and the dryer (on low) and they're still as comfy as the first time, if not more so. Definitely worth the money. A+
customer_reviews.author: SubduedBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Mine came defective! Cheaply made. Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: Both slippers are not sewn at the seams in the exact same spot!! I just got these and the arrived defective. Don’t know how they had so many great reviews. BOO!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. My mother is a size 7 shoe so I bought size 7-8 and her feet hang out the backs of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fern Mergl

customer_reviews.title: NOT a thick supportive sole. Don’t be fooled.
customer_reviews.text: Only bought these because my preferred house shoes have extortion pricing right now since they are out of season. These are Definitely NOT a thick supportive sole. I wish I would has listened to those reviews. I have hard wood throughout so that definitely makes an impact. I have back pain and need thick cushioning. When I press my fingers between inner and outer sole, it feels like less than a centimeter if actual material. Most of it is just fluff. Granted, it’s super soft, but I have to wear these with thick winter socks to make up for the lack of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMilkyTitties

customer_reviews.title: Spend more money to get a quality product !
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy some slippers around the house and saw these had pretty good reviews. Initially they were comfy and nice to walk in. About a week or two after wearing them everyday. The memory foam insert just disappeared. Now I feel like I’m just walking on the rubber soles. Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: D.S

customer_reviews.title: LESS THAN TWO MONTHS AND THEY ARE WORN DOWN
customer_reviews.text: I have had an awful time with these slippers. I really needed something to wear around the apartment while doing basic chores and these have not cut it. The memory foam is already worn down completely so it feels uncomfortable and not at all supportive ALSO when I received the slippers the product says to give time for the shoe to form to your foot and I did think it would but the slipper does not fit properly at all. I regret getting these slippers. I also tried for a return and amazon did not allow for it when the seller supposedly has 100% satisfaction guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Nb238

customer_reviews.title: Average slippers
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are cute but that's all. I wear a size 8 1/2 running shoe and the 7-8 was plenty big (maybe even a bit too big once they stretched a bit). We have hardwood floors throughout and I wouldn't say these slippers give any more cushion than any other slipper out there. I feel the soles collapsed within a day and the slipper doesn't do anything other than keep my feet warm and protect my toes from run-ins with furniture and toys.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fits right great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I was worried they would be too small when I saw them but when I slid my feet in them they were just right. Soft and warm and easy to walk in. I can go outdoors as well without worrying I will mess them up since they have the nice rubber bottom. They are a great deal for the price and I feel they compare very well with others that are much more expensive. A great gift for yourself or someone else without breaking the bank. Fits true to size. My feet are a little wide and I wear an 8-9 shoe. I got a size 7-8 and they're just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Owings

customer_reviews.title: RUNS SMALL!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8.5 to a 9 depending on how the shoes fit, but normally I order an 8.5 unless I'm buying boots and I need a little extra room if I wear thick socks. I always buy slippers in a 9-10 and never have an issue. All I wanted to do, was to replace my shower slippers. My feet hang off the back and my toes are crammed up front. I thought I was sent the wrong size by mistake, but...nope they are just WAY TOO SMALL!! I guess I'll have to see if my mom or sister can wear them. They actually seem nice, just a waste. Now I have to continue looking...
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write many reviews, but these are amazing. I’m a personal trainer and on my feet all day. I’m a comfy shoe snob as a result of always being in supportive sneakers and these slippers are fantastic. Very cushy, rubber (no slip) bottom, and seem true to size. I’m normally a 5/5.5 and have very thin/narrow feet and the 5-6 fit perfect. If you’re consistently a size 6, however, I’d go for the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Hope

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy and Cozy!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the reviewers comments were accurate in the sense that when I first received my slippers I tried them on, but it seemed like they didn't fit me properly. My shoe size is usually between a size 7-8. However, after walking around them in the house they started to mold to my feet. They are by far the best slippers ever!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are perfect. Like you, I read soooo many reviews. I tried to be cheap and just buy the cheapest slippers I found but before I added them to my cart I decided to just read some reviews and I’m so glad I did. These aren’t the cheapest but they aren’t very expensive either. If you are like me you wear slippers everyday and you want them to be comfortable and last a long time. These are so comfortable and great quality. I’m always cold and they keep my feet warm without having to wear socks. When they wear out, I’ll be buying the same pair again.
customer_reviews.author: J0113

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a pair of slippers like these but could never justify paying so much for brands that make this style. I decided I would get myself a quarantine treat since I barely make it out of sweats lately. I came across these and the price was right and they looked just like what I’ve always wanted. And oh my gosh, they are perfect! I’m actually going to get a pair for my husband and mother too. It’s a nice comfort slipping these on in the morning and beginning my day. The foam fits perfectly to my feet and they have rubber soles so I’m not all staticky and shocking everything I touch which is a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: FoxOntheRun

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This order took one month to arrive and then the top of the shoes is filled with plastic so you make an awful noise when you walk. I can't wear this sleepers. If I had known the poor quality I would not have purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: M Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and WARM!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and very WARM. (my feet are sweating!)..I purchased a Medium (7-8) as I normally wear between a 71/2 - 8 depending on the shoe. My heel comes right to the end. These are nice and roomy which I like because I have a wide foot. If you run narrow I think they wouldn't work well. For the price, you can't beat them!!
customer_reviews.author: RobinLou

customer_reviews.title: Does Ultraideas really exist?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 9-10 based on reviews that they run small and I'm an 8-8.5. But they are too big. Also the memory foam is there until you wear them then the heel is just flat. The tag attached said returns are hassle free even if they have been worn so I tried going to their website but my browser said it was unsecure. I tried their Facebook page but it doesn't exist. I emailed but no response. I could try returning through Amazon but since they've been worn I don't know if they would accept them. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patti F.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8.5 or 9 wide and I ordered a large and they fit perfectly! They are super comfortable and warm. Love the hard bottom (sorry for the dirt in the photos, I have worn mine well!) Perfect for taking out the trash or quick walk outside. I usually wear them with stocks but either way they keep my feet nice and toasty. Really good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: mf1431

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small, but super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these slippers today and immediately thought to write a review on the size. If you like your slippers to fit pretty snug then order your regular size. I like mine a bit bigger, so I wish I sized up. I’m normally a 9 and ordered L 9/10, for reference. Other than the size issue these are really comfy and padded on both the sole and the bridge areas. The bottoms seem like they’ll be pretty tough and the color is true to the photo. Overall, I’m a fan so far. The size thing isn’t a deal breaker so I won’t be sending them back as they do indeed fit.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Guerrieri

customer_reviews.title: Just in time for cold weather!
customer_reviews.text: I received these slippers a few days ago and already I love them! The fit is good and they are so cozy and warm! The soles are sturdy enough that you could wear them outside with no worries and they are perfect for around the house. I got the purple color, which I love. The slippers are cute, warm and do exactly what I wanted them for and the price was quite reasonable. I am very, very happy! I highly recommend purchasing these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I can wear size 3 in girls, and nothing bigger than a 6 in womens, but I found these to be too small. I am quite surprised I ended up needing the mediums. To be honest, the small were a "perfect fit" if I stood in them, but as soon as I started to walk, my heel would slip out the back. I went up a size so I can wear socks if I want, and so they're comfortable to move around in. Other than that, the inside feels nice and soft, and they're a cute design.
customer_reviews.author: kring

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of positive reviews I decided to purchase these slippers. They are exactly as described. They are super soft on the inside. The have a very good amount of cushion without feeling thick and overly padded. They wear well indoors and on the few occasions when I have had to run outside or out to the garage-although these are sturdy and can handle more than that. The color (I got grey) is not solid but rather a layering of grey, dark grey, white, etc. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase-so much so I am thinking about purchasing these for holiday gifts for all the ladies!
customer_reviews.author: ButterflyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great color, seems sturdy. Often times bedroom slippers don't feel comfortable on my sensitive feet (fibromyalgia pain) but these are great, easy to slip on and off. I have not washed them (I hope they're machine washable) but I didn't check for that before buying them. The are also warm, even when it's a little chilly I don't have to have on socks.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Cozy, and Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! Looking for something that would be warm and useful, I discovered the Ultraideas while I was looking around on Amazon. I checked some other vendors to compare prices and find a review or two, but I think my mind was already made up. After I'd ordered, I saw someone's comment that they run large, but this wasn't my experience. And I especially like the soles, which do as well in the yard as they do in the house. They haven't samples snow yet, but I'm quite certain they'll be perfect for a dash to the mailbox. The price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary_SC

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers, gave me arch support the first month or so and then not so much after. There is still cushion tho so I don't get sore feet; like if I were to go barefoot (on hardwood flooring). They keep my feet very warm in a Michigan winter. One thing I hate is that the sherpa like lining picks up things....like hard nyla bone pieces my dog leaves around. But overall not unhappy. Edit:5 months later, they got more flat, support wise and they make my feet sweat and hold the smell. I use a spray and air them out. But not super happy long term with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ahnee

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Truly love them!! My apartment is all wood floors and my feet get super achy walking around barefoot, and these were definitely the solution. Was hoping these slippers would live up to the hype of the rest of the reviews and they certainly did, so much so that I’m planning on ordering my boyfriend a pair, too! These are a no-brainer and a total steal if you’re in need of new slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Not Tryna Be a Diva

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but cushion didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I was dealing with some pretty intense foot pain (mostly my heels) during pregnancy. They were wonderful at first, but it didn't take long for the cushioning to become crushed and not very effective. I probably should have gone with more expensive slippers with actual support. They're still nice, I wear them everyday, and I like the look, feel, and ease of use. I would highly recommend these if you're just looking for regular slipper needs, but for actual support or cushion I would recommend something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tamblyn

customer_reviews.title: These slippers are amazingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I don't do a lot of reviews, but I love these slippers so much I've worn them every day since they arrived. I read the reviews and many had said they run small so I was a bit on the fence about ordering true to size, but did anyway. My feet are closer to a size 7 than 8, so I ordered the 7-8 and they fit perfect. These slippers are amazingly comfortable! Oct 6, 2020: These are still my go to slippers. I've had them for several months and they still have cushion, are side, warm, and cozy. I highly recommend and will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Barels

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up
customer_reviews.text: To start, I’m a size 9 1/2 but after reading other reviews I decided to order the 11/12 size and that was definitely the best choice. The shoes themselves are very comfortable, soft, and the rubber soles are great for non-slip or outdoor use. My one issue is they put the tiny tags in each shoe right where the inside of your arch hits the side of the shoe. It is incredibly unpleasant! I’m cutting out the tags tomorrow but I just felt like that was a really weird design choice. Over all they seem great.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Give them time to mold to your feet
customer_reviews.text: These are so cozy and perfect for putting around the house. Don't panic if they arrive and at first feel too tight. It took about 1 week to break them in and they have molded to my feet perfectly. I was waiting to write this review until giving them a quick run through the washing machine and have done just that. They held up wonderfully through the washing machine and are being left to air dry at the moment. My biggest complaint is that they do look a little dirty after some time as the fleecy material tends to attract dust. I knew this before buying them, however, and will not take a star off for it.
customer_reviews.author: Hye-Mi

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Fit Beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy the 7-8 size after reading reviews - I am a 7.5 and most reviews said to go up a size if you are a half size even though the details of the slippers said not to. I am glad I went 7-8 because they fit perfectly! It took about 5 days or so to form to my feet but they’re so comfy! I sprained my ankle this past summer and walking barefoot really bothers my foot still. These provide enough cushion I’ve had no pain and the soles seem much sturdier than the name brand ones I purchased last year at Christmas that already wore out after a year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cash

customer_reviews.title: A little big but still comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. They’re very very warm, and very comfortable even though as you can see in the pictures (standing up and sitting down), without my socks on they’re a little bit loose. But I like to wear socks with my slippers so this is perfect. I wear a size 8 1/2 and I got the 8-9. I probably could’ve gotten a 7-8 if I wanted them a little more snug without socks on, but I like to wear them with socks. Made very well. Delivered fast.
customer_reviews.author: Dfly3770

customer_reviews.title: Comfy slippers
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this is the first pair of slippers that I have ever purchased for myself. I work from home and really wanted something comfy and warm to wear around. Sturdy rubber sole and I didn't slip when walking out in the rain. Very comfy fit, I have worn them a ton already! My only complaint so far was the smell when they were first opened. I know that typically stuff shipped here from overseas has that de gassing smell. Fortunately it is gone after a few days, but it was really unpleasant at first.
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: They are cute, but too small
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, but too small. I wear an 8-8.5 shoe. So, I ordered the 7-8. It’s too small. I thought I could still wear them, but with the harder rubber sole, as I walk it kind of sticks me in the bottom of my heel which is uncomfortable. I’ve already thrown away my packaging thinking I’d be keeping them. But, they’re just too small. I do like them enough that I ordered the 9-10 size and will just lose the money on the smaller pair unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: NRFitz

customer_reviews.title: Good house shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Wife wore the HECK out of these bad boys like Crocs came back. They last long and do the job. They keep the feet warm and didn't keep me from throwin em on to go check the mail with my coffee. Im 24 so that's sayin something! Its nicer to have the rubber bottom than the cloth as if youre cleaning or something theyre not getting soaked, and when you have to wear them outside, they are okay. Obviously cloth would be miserable stepping on wet anything.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Matthews

customer_reviews.title: A hole after two days.
customer_reviews.text: I received these two days ago and immediately loved them. They are soft and very comfy to wear. Today, however, when I was wearing them I noticed there is a hole on the side where the fabric meets the sole. It appears as though the sewing came apart. I am highly disappointed in the quality of these slippers. I am sad to say that I would not recommend spending the money on them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Baker

customer_reviews.title: Go up in size if you are in between sizes. The inside of the slippers are nice and soft!
customer_reviews.text: The slippers are very comfortable and warm. I will be wearing them a lot in the cold months in Montana. I was unsure if I should buy size 11-12 because I usually wear size 10 and maybe 11 depending on the shoe. But it was a nice surprise when I tried them on because the fit was perfect! So if anyone is a size 10, I would go up in size. Size 9-10 would have been a bit tight for me. My toes have just enough wiggle room, so I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Roku Fan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but small: EDIT- I ordered Mens sizing for a better fit.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I was contacted by the seller who sent me a mens size 11-12 and they fit comfortably with some extra room for winter socks. Their customer service was great about communicating and sending new slippers, it was much appreciated! They slippers are really comfy and warm, however I usually wear a women's 10 and I ordered up (11-12) thinking I'll be wearing thick winter socks with these- however they 11-12 is small! My foot hangs off the back a little, so that is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kate A

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them! You’ll thank me later!
customer_reviews.text: Not much else I can say here besides BUY THE SLIPPERS. I was super hesitant because I know memory foam can wear down and get too loose, but these literally defied every single expectation and more. The single most comfortable slippers I’ve ever bought, and they are BEYOND soft. Don’t be worried about the size! So many people on here express worry about “don’t get them too big” but I am a size 8 and I ordered a size 9 (just for some extra comfort and wiggle room) and I PROMISE you they felt amazing regardless. You will NOT regret it, so go for it!! Buy the slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Sumrada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect House Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad foot fracture a few years ago with major surgery. I’ve been having problems again and my doctor recommended I wear house shoes all of the time. Ugh. Someone who walks barefoot 75% of the time....so these aren’t pretty. But they are way comfy. They don’t offer much arch support but they are comfy on the heels and toes (where most of my foot pain is located!) The sizing is perfect. And the did widen up after wearing them a few times. They were tight when I first put my feet in.
customer_reviews.author: JennJennRN

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these slippers. I’m a 10 - 10 1/2 W. I followed the advice of the seller and others and sized up to an 11/12. They fit perfectly with plenty of room in the toe box. I’m actually a bit picky about slippers as I hate when you can feel the seam at the toe and on these you definitely can’t. The material inside is lovely and soft. I’d like if the memory foam soles were a little thicker but would happily buy them again anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Carol O'Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Feet Treats - Part 2
customer_reviews.text: Slippers do work indoors and out - thought a bit tight first day - but by second the snug was just right. My thing is not used to no back felt like my foot extended off back - turns out it doesn't - slippers fit my feet. I might just have to buy another pair to keep in the car. Guess what - got another pair (red/black) - got them snug on my feet - received a day earlier than expected. I wear them indoor/outdoor - all about (1st pair) - now got the 2nd to enjoy even more! (May 2020)
customer_reviews.author: Pegret

customer_reviews.title: No support whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: I read to get a size larger and that isn’t true, I am usually a 9 so i ordered the next size up and they are huge. They also have ZERO support. If you are wanting a thick shoe like slipper due to foot pain in the mornings these slippers are NOT it. They may feel thicker for 2 minutes but after wearing them they are super flat with zero support. If you are just wanting your feet to be warm then sure, get these but for planters fasciitis or any other foot pain these aren’t the slippers for you.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Young

customer_reviews.title: Meant as slippers
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are super comfy! They are soft and warm, and the memory foam bottom makes them great to stand/walk in around the house. The bottom is a hard rubber material, so you can walk outside without damaging the shoe. There is not much arch support and the slippers are a bit wider than expected. Overall, a great purchase for walking around in the house or running outside quickly. Not recommended for support. Update: Two weeks later the nice white fuzziness has flattened a bit, but that hasn't taken away from the comfort of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My order came quickly and the packaging was well done. I opened the package and the slippers looked just like the ones in the product photo. What I liked about the slippers were they were nice and comfortable and at first I felt a little snug but when I walked around in them for a little while they stretched so that they fit my feet perfectly. They are nice and toasty and perfect for the cold weather. I would recommend these slippers for anyone who has issues with neuropathy and swelling. I'm really happy that I chose the slippers and I would highly recommend them. The price is perfect as well.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these in September and just threw them away. They were great the first month, used them indoors only. They stretched out and went flat, I am not a big person at all! I ended up buying a cheap pair that come out during the holidays and they fit 100 better than these. Don’t waste your money, not worth having to replace them in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: India D

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6.5 so I went down in size and I'm glad that I did. Once they were broken in a bit, they fit like a dream. If I'd gone bigger, they would have slipped off my feet. I went with purple, it's a dark purple, and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jes B

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support.
customer_reviews.text: First, on size: I wear a 5.5-6, and bought a 5-6, and it is barely long enough. I rarely have that problem! I have very wide feet though, and this does work, possibly because it's so squishy. On general comfort: yes, it's warm. YES, it will stretch out (I've only worn these a couple days and can tell). But though it's loaded with fluffy squishy stuff, it does not offer support. I have plantar fasciitis, and this will not be enough to keep my feet comfy. I was trying to buy less expensive slippers than normal, but sadly have to go back to the pricey ones.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Markward

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and cold feet
customer_reviews.text: Super cute slippers, unfortunately, I ordered a size 9-10 and they didn’t fit, my feet were literally hanging off the back (I wear an 8.5-9 shoes) my daughter tried them on (she wears a size 7) and they fit perfectly! I did check and the bottom says they are size 9-10 which they clearly ARE NOT. Order a size up! Totally bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and prevents plantar fasciitis pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar faciitis but hate wearing shoes in the house. These slippers are comfy and prevent pain, even when I'm standing or walking around, way better than other slippers I've had. I bought my first pair of these 2 years ago and wore them constantly. Even after 2 years, they were still in decent shape but the padding was worn down so I purchased again. I normally wear 7 1/2-8 but these run small so I got the 9-10 large.
customer_reviews.author: Rease K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable after awhile, as they run a little short.
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews that reported they run small. I wear a size 6 so I got size 5-6. They would probably fit a size 5 foot perfect but they are short for a size 6. I'm slowly getting them broken in but not yet my go-to slippers. I do like the sole so I can wear them outside the house (meaning the porch or garage, not the store :) ) I wouldn't go up a size because then I feel I would be kinda swimming in them so will stick with these. Recommended if you are on the lower size of the slipper; you'll probably have better luck with how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbylulu

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: MUCH BETTER then expected! I LOVE these! Comfortable, warm on my feet. CAN'T beat them! I got another major brand from an online store and they were 5x the amount of these! I sent them back b/c they were nearly worn to a frazzle w/I a months time. I Expected these to NOT hold after a month! But they look as good as new! GET "em for the deal! I LOVE the purple ones! I even run outside w/these on and they STILL look as GOOD AS NEW after +1 month of wear!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE - fits snug at first but seriously wait it out
customer_reviews.text: I've always been the type of person who returns slippers if they're too tight and buy the next size up, but then after a couple of weeks, the slippers are too big. This time, I took the product page's advice and I wore them regularly for a couple of days before making up my mind. It was absolutely worth it. These are so soft and comfortable. I feel like I'm walking on air as well as having my feet feel supported.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. Super comfortable and cute. We don't wear shoes in our house and my feet are always freezing. Our dog drools everywhere after he drinks water.. well more like the water pipes out of his mouth after he is done. I don't like stepping on the wet carpet so these are perfect for avoiding that. They have help up great. Daily wear and I don't even need to replace them. Most of my slippers don't last long or hold up so this is a huge win for me. Definitely going to get another pain when these go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elderly Mom LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.text: So, a cancer-stricken old lady with vinegar in her blood who hasn't wanted slippers for ten years finally asked for a pair. SHE LOVES THESE! They look very comfortable and she says they are sturdy, BEYOND COMFORTABLE, and have enough traction to help her not slide all over. SO, based on the thoughts of a very, very picky and difficult consumer, I would have to say this is a great pair of slippers. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: SurreallyReal

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The slippers are exactly as described when I read the description before ordering, which you don't always get when ordering online. They are extremely comfortable and the inside is super soft. The bottoms of the slippers are nonslip. I do wish the inside material wasn't a cream color. But that was the only option with the outside pattern I wanted and I knew the color I was getting when I ordered. So I don't count that against the company/slipper. Despite that, I would order this slipper again, especially considering how quickly they arrived (I live in Alaska).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Slippers!! Your feet will Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Excellent slippers! I normally wear a size 7.5 or 8 sneaker and I have a wide foot. I was worried about what size to get even though the online help for the perfect fit suggested an 8. I decided to get the size 9 and I feel like I won the lottery! These slippers are perfect in every way!!! I like to wear socks and there is plenty of room with or without and they are not sloppy because of the memory foam. The soles are durable and flexible. I don't think they are the most fashionable but my feet sure enjoy the comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Christy22

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COMFORTABLE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend of mine that I've known for 45 plus years. Because i bought a pair for me. They're extremely comfortable. My friend is a diabetic. And she was waiting for her diabetic shoes. Her feet were hurting her really bad. So i bought them for her. She got them, and she put them on, SHE LOVES THEM!!! I may be buying another pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kara will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Slippers
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 8 1/2W so I ordered 9-10. The manufacturer description advised wearing a few times allow shoe to adjust to your feet and they did. Initially I thought they would be too short and tight but after 2 evenings wearing them . .Perfect and very comfortable. They seem to just wrap around your feet and keep them in place. Most importantly for me is the non-skid sole. I have real hardwood floors and these shoes really are non-skid!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these slippers for a 2nd time
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of these slippers in 2018 and they held up great even with multiple washings. I saw them again on Amazon before Christmas at a discount and realized that they held up really well for slippers I wear all the time at home so I purchased a second pair. My 2018 model is still alive and well and when they wear out, I’ll have my 2019 slippers ready to go. These slippers wear like iron yet feel like clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Webshopper

customer_reviews.title: Beware - they run small
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read all the reviews saying to buy a size up. These definitely run small. I ordered the size that fits 9-10 as I’m a 9.5 shoe size but they slide off my feet and my heel falls out when I walk. The tag on the slipper said to contact the seller directly and they’d send out a replacement pair if they don’t fit, however I did that and they said to go through Amazon. So now I’m returning - and probably going with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Being in Corona Quarantine, a new pair of house slippers was a must! These were the perfect pick. They were a little snug to start but as the memory foam shaped to my feet they became the perfectly cozy. The rubber soles make me unafraid to wear them out on the back patio when taking the dog out and they keep my feet just warm enough that I'm not cold but not so warm that my feet sweat. 10/10 would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: charity

customer_reviews.title: These are the BEST slippers. I've tried on a few different brands ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST slippers. I've tried on a few different brands in stores and none of them fit right. Decided to take a chance on these and I'm so glad I did. I typically wear a size 8.5 in gym shoes. I ordered the large and they fit like a glove! These are so warm and the bottoms are durable enough to wear outside if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Comfy slippers
customer_reviews.text: I needed new slippers and decided to try these thanks to the good reviews. It was a good choice! They are very comfortable and they have a nice thick sole so they aren’t flimsy like many slippers. I took the recommendations of sizing up and glad I did because they do run a little small. They are great and I’ll probably buy them again when I need a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for my swollen pregnant feet. They are comfortable, easy to slide on and off, and they dont make my feet sweat even if I'm not wearing socks (which is great because it's so hard to get socks on right now lol). They don't fall off when I'm walking but don't feel too snug either and I like that they have the rubber bottom so if I happen to step in water or something my feet won't get wet. Overall, a cute good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I liked these a lot but it’s August and I bought them in May and they’re already completely worn out. It’s crazy! This is the first time trying this brand. I’m so bummed they didn’t last longer :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, you'll like these =)
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot so I'm unsure if you can go by my comments here on width as I find them a little wide for me, but for what they are, they work. I wear a size 7 shoe and purchased the 7/8 which works just fine. They're very comfortable & warm and I like the fact that they have hard bottoms vs soft as they feel more supportive as a result. Thank you also for the speedy shipment! I'd recommend these in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bach

customer_reviews.title: Better than Ugg’s
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved her Ugg slippers but after about 5 years they had seen their last day. She looked for some on Amazon and stumbled on these and figured she would try them to save a buck until she could find the Ugg’s she wanted. These look better in my opinion and the wife thinks they fit better. Thank God these came because she likes them more than the Ugg’s and saved us about $150 in the process. Would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks to these shoes...run small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law bought these for me for xmas. The original ones were too small (as a medium/I wear an 8) so ordered the next size up (9), they still ran small as my heel is riding on the back of the shoe. I wanted the hard soled shoes (as I used to be able to buy) because I wear them outside in the morning. These shoes attract everything possible. Not a good material for a house shoe.
customer_reviews.author: barbjvan

customer_reviews.title: A slipper you can trot outside with
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and cute slippers. They really do have excellent rubber soles so you can go out in the yard or to fetch the paper. I have worn them to drive the car and visit in them. I don't think I could use them for a full day's work because I need more support. But they are comfy and do exactly what they say -- nice and fleece-lined inside. A charming wool cover outside. And those wonderful rubber soles.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: When I got them I was happy soft, comfy and fit ordered the size after reading reviews. Now 45 days later the rubber on the bottom is worn out 😫 not happy. My last pair of slippers I had that were similar from different company lasted 4 years before signs of wear not 45 days!
customer_reviews.author: Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 month, that’s a bit disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These slippers were very comfortable for the first few months, then they loosened up and became quite large. After 6 months of wear, they came apart. I would have expected them to last one year, otherwise, what a waste of resources.
customer_reviews.author: Nbg

customer_reviews.title: OK slipper
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for several months now. While they have a tiny bit of arch support, the "cushion" in the footbed has flattened out so it doesn't really feel all that cushioned any more. They are ok, but I wouldn't order another pair. (The soles are wearing well, which is a plus.) Also, the "wool" part really looks worn and older than the shoes really are. Over all, just an OK pair of slippers.
customer_reviews.author: manyhats4

customer_reviews.title: Fits better than first thought
customer_reviews.text: ... when first trying on, I thought they were too small and considered returning. But I decided to keep even if snug. Well, they loosened up significantly as I wore them and foam compressed. After a couple weeks of daily wear they still fit great. Was pleasantly surprised and was going to buy another pair in a different color but I see the price jumped by $5, so I decided to wait and see how long they actually last. They do look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 6 shoe. I ordered the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6 shoe. I ordered the 5-6 slipper. It is about 1/4 to 1/2 inch smaller than I prefer. I am hoping they will loose over time as most sheering slippers do. They are cute and the memory foam is comfy.
customer_reviews.author: harleydakota

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and snuggly!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and did not go a size up either. I'm a 9.5 and bought a 9-10. When I first put them on, my heel also was on the ridge and I thought they'd be uncomfortable and considered returning. BUT.. I did what other posters did and wore them for a day or two and now they fit perfect! My heel is safely inside where it should be and just love these slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: It's Totally Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness...I had an old pair similar to these and that's why I ordered these...they are even better than my old ones. I totally loved them and yes, your email said to wear them for a few days until they settle in, well, I only had to do that for 2 days and they are perfect. I bought a pair for my husband in the men's and he loves his. I would buy again and definitely recommend them. Perfect and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers, but size up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 7 1/2, and I always wear size 8 in shoes, so I ordered the 7-8. They are wayyyy too small. My heal was hanging off the back edge. I should have read all the reviews first telling me to size up. I will exchange these for a larger size because they are super cushy and very soft, and the sole is a really nice tough rubber. Perfect for house shoes!
customer_reviews.author: amy3d

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: We’re nice in the beginning, didn’t last long but I didn’t expect they would I’m very hard on my slippers and the minute I take them off someone else (kids and husband) tend to walk off in them. I’m giving them 4 stars because they are comfortable and lasted about the same amount of time as other slippers (this type) I’ve purchased. I also kept finding them on everyone Else’s feet.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first but give them time
customer_reviews.text: When I first received these slippers, I almost returned them. Then I read the little tag on the slipper that said they may be tight at first but give them a few days. So I did, and lo and behold, I now love them. I have a very difficult time with shoes, and slippers are no exception. I have thrown away, or returned, more than I can count. So I am pleased that I can give these 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra wide then stretches cld find a better pair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had for several months now. And they are extremely wide to begin with and they stretch. The flexible rubber bottom is thin but protects from dangerous legos. Not adequate for outside especially since stretching it can be somewhat dangerous even taking thevtrash to the curb. I got the red bc it was cheaper. Length is good but extra wide then additional stretch. The padding isnt very thick either
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Reading

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy! Snug at first but stretches out
customer_reviews.text: Due to quarantine, I've been working at home and since I rarely leave the apt, I basically walk on hard wood floors 24/7. I got these to give me more cushion and support while at home. As other reviewers have said, they do start out snug, but they mold to your feet the more you wear them and after a 1-2 days, they fit just fine. One thing to note is that I'm usually a 7 - 7.5 and I got the 7/8 size and I just barely fit lengthwise. So you may want to size up if you're a size 8. But I am super happy with this purchase and really enjoy walking around with them at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cheng

customer_reviews.title: My half-size peeps: Order Up
customer_reviews.text: If you are a half-size ORDER UP. Based on other reviews, I ordered a larger size than I typically wear and I’m glad I did! I am a true 6.5 but ordered the 7-8 in these and they fit like a dream. They have great cushion and it doesn’t flatten and feel gross like a lot of other bedroom shoes do. I have thrown them in the washing machine twice and they have held up perfectly. I might even have to buy another pair for outside use...
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Warm, cozy and snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for some cozy slippers for winter and when I found these I thought they were perfect. I have a very skinny foot and these were a bit tight when I first put them on but finally broke them in. My 8 month old spilled food on them and after a quick wash they ended up with the little fabric balls over them. I love the rubber sole and the soft cushion though. Wish I would have gotten a bigger size and an extra pair
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Woodson

customer_reviews.title: 7/8 is a little tight for a size 8. Go up a size for 8.5.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears a size eight. These slippers just barely fit her feet. The heel of her foot sits just inside of the outside fringe of the slipper. It would be nice to have a little bit of leeway’s. But this slipper definitely wouldn’t fit someone with a size 8.5. Go one size up. Besides that, the slippers are comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: was very happy with this purchase - fits well and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These were definitely a little snug when first put on, but they loosened up within hours. I have been wearing them almost constantly for a week now and are very comfortable, with a good fit (snug enough to keep my feet warm and stay on my feet), and very comfortable and soft. I have no complaints at this point and would definitely buy these again. I'm mostly using them in my house so cannot comment on wear/tear if people wanted to use them more outdoors but they do have hard soles so they could be used outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer elliot

product_meta.title: ULTRAIDEAS Women's Cozy Memory Foam Slippers Fuzzy Wool-Like Plush Fleece Lined House Shoes w/Indoor, Outdoor Anti-Skid Rubber Sole
feature_bullets: ULTRA-SOFT WOOL-LIKE PLUSH FLEECE LINING: It is easy slip-on design slippers, along with high-quality and comfort man-made fluffy plush fleece lining that encompasses your feet very well and offers soothing comfort.

DURABLE & ANTI-SKID RUBBER SOLE: The light-weight and durable rubber sole makes the fuzzy knitted slippers perfect for indoor and outdoor family use. Anti-slip outsole allows for stepping noiselessly in the bedroom. Each of your steps will become steadier with slip-resistant texture on the bottom.
HIGH-DENSITY MEMORY FOAM INSOLE: The stylish fuzzy knitted no back slippers is lined with high-density memory foam that really molds to your feet and retains the shape.

STYLES & COLOR OPTIONS: Available in black grey blue and wine perfect for women from all ages and lifestyles. They are great gifts for girlfriend, wife, mommy, daughter and your loved ones who would like to refresh her daily wearing.

IN ADDITION:① Easy to care - machine washable;② Constructed with wool-like plush upper and high density cushioning, these slippers may feel a bit snug at first and then they will stretch a little to a customized fit after several wearing.
